document_data.name: Orran
document_data.mainbody: '''Orran''' was a senior [[Doomguide]] and priest of [[Kelemvor]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: As a member of the [[Eternal Order of Kelemvor]], Orran's mission was to preserve [[Neverdeath Graveyard]] and cleanse it of [[undead]].
document_data.Relationships: He was a contemporary and associate of Doomguide [[Volahk]].
document_data.History: In the early goings of the events known as the ''[[Tyranny of Dragons]]'', circa the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Orrin began investigating a group of [[Red Wizards]] that were exhuming bodies in the Neverdeath Graveyard. He worked with adventurers to clear the holy graveyards of undead abominations and cleanse the lands by means of [[Kelemvor]]'s influence.
